text: Renée Simonot (born Jeanne Renée Deneuve; 10 September 1911 - 11 July 2021) was a French actress. She was known for being one of the first French actresses to dub an English movie. She mostly dubbed Olivia de Havilland and Sylvia Sidney. A stage actress, she appeared in many productions of Les Misérables. Simonot died on 11 July 2021 in Paris, just two months before her 110th birthday.La mère de Catherine Deneuve, Renée Dorléac, est morte à l'âge de 109 ansMort de Renée Simonot, mère de Catherine Deneuve et doyenne des actrices ==References== Category:1911 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French centenarians Category:French movie actors Category:French stage actors Category:French television actors Category:People from Le Havre
title: Renée Simonot
